|brand = PESI |model = WP222M |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = C2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 0254 |device_id = 0000 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:06:F4
|chip1 = ShareWave;SW2220; |chip2 = RFMD;RF3000; |chip3 = RFMD;RF2948B; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2002 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== A date code (year+week) of '''0209''' (Feb. 25th to March 3rd, 2002) is silkscreened on the board.
This device uses the ''[[ShareWave]]'' (later bought out by ''[[Cirrus Logic]]'') ''Bodega'' chipset. :The cards support 802.11b and ShareWave's proprietary Whitecap2 protocol.
This card's PCMCIA device strings in Windows are.. *<small>PCMCIA\Cirrus-Whitecap2-C12D</small> *<small>PCMCIA\Cirrus-Whitecap2-0254-0000</small>
The card works in Windows with the WP222M driver.. which can be downloaded [https://deviwiki.com/files/ShareWave/Bodega/WP222M_Driver&Utility_USA_36.zip here].
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:PESI_sharewave_wc2_213ZMPP_pcb_top.jpg|PCB top File:PESI_sharewave_wc2_213ZMPP_pcb_bot.jpg|PCB bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
